scripts.build_frontend: cd src/frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build_static_frontend: cd src/static-site && npm install && npm run build
scripts.reset: dfx deploy stadium --mode reinstall -y && dfx deploy teams --mode reinstall -y && dfx deploy users --mode reinstall -y && dfx deploy players --mode reinstall -y && dfx deploy league --mode reinstall -y
